name: CVE-2021-34761
description: A vulnerability in Cisco Firepower Threat Defense (FTD) Software could allow an authenticated, local attacker to overwrite or append arbitrary data to system files using root-level privileges. The attacker must have administrative credentials on the device. This vulnerability is due to incomplete validation of user input for a specific CLI command. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by authenticating to the device with administrative privileges and issuing a CLI command with crafted user parameters. A successful exploit could allow the attacker to overwrite or append arbitrary data to system files using root-level privileges.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_management_center_virtual_appliance:6.2.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:sourcefire_defense_center:6.4.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_threat_defense:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_threat_defense:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_threat_defense:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:sourcefire_defense_center:6.2.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:sourcefire_defense_center:7.1.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_management_center_virtual_appliance:7.1.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:sourcefire_defense_center:6.6.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:sourcefire_defense_center:6.7.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:sourcefire_defense_center:7.0.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_management_center_virtual_appliance:6.4.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_management_center_virtual_appliance:6.6.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_management_center_virtual_appliance:6.7.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_management_center_virtual_appliance:7.0.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_threat_defense:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
